summary: This is a docket activity notice from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals indicating that attorney Martin G. Weinberg has been added as counsel for Jeffrey Epstein in case 19-2221. The notice was electronically mailed to Weinberg and Reid Weingarten.

persons.name: Martin G. Weinberg
persons.context: Added as attorney of record for Jeffrey Epstein in the appellate case United States v. Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The defendant in the appellate case United States v. Epstein, for whom Martin G. Weinberg is added as counsel.

persons.name: Reid Weingarten
persons.context: An attorney who also receives electronic notice of the docket activity regarding the addition of Martin G. Weinberg.

connections.description: Weinberg is added as legal counsel for Epstein in the appellate case.

events.title: Attorney Added to Epstein's Appellate Case
events.description: Martin G. Weinberg is added as an attorney for Jeffrey Epstein in the Second Circuit Court of Appeals case 19-2221, United States v. Epstein.

keyFacts: Martin G. Weinberg was added as an attorney for Jeffrey Epstein in appellate case 19-2221 on August 5, 2019.
The case is United States of America v. Epstein in the Second Circuit Court of Appeals.
Electronic notice of this docket activity was sent to attorneys Martin G. Weinberg and Reid Weingarten.
